price: Ampa sԑ Yɛakᴐ so akyerԑkyerԑ (Nsԑm no) mu yie akyerԑ wᴐn sԑdeԑ wᴐbԑkaekaeԑ anaa wᴐde bɛtu wᴐn ho foᴐ, nanso nnipa pii mpԑ (Nokorԑ no) na mmom wᴐkᴐ so yi boniayԑ.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَٰهُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ فَأَبَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnāhu baynahum liyadhakkarū fa-abā aktharu al-nāsi illā kufūran
